    getSelectedPOIs method return the POI list which is on current floor and is selected by checkbox type
    ArrayList<POI>
    dataStorage.searchPoi(String keyword)
    searchPoi method, given a keyword, return all the pois that contain the keyword in their name, category, description, floor number, room number and building
